description: 1.	 (T1) Weeping Willow: Reduce back to previous pollard points:  Current height 12m / width 4m - request to reduce to H: 8m and W: 3m2.	(T2) Laurel - area at the end of the garden is severely overgrown over the shed and fence which allows no light or rain to other plants in the area.Current h: 9m w: 5m; request to reduce to h: 4m and w: 4m.3.	(T3) Cherry tree - at edge of property - the health of this tree cannot be determined until foliage/shrubbery surrounding it is removed.  The branches that can be seen appear to have perished.  Current h: 3m w: 2m; Request to reduce to h: 2m and w: 1.5m. Request to remove the tree if found it has perished.4.	(T4) Home Oak previously pruned (with planning permission) Currently h: 12m; w: 6m; request reduction to previous h; 8m w; 4m.5.	(T5) Removal of leaning holly tree;	Current h: 4m w: 1m.6.	(T6) Prune pear tree; Current h: 6m w: 2.5m; reduce to h: 4m and w: 1.5m7.	(T7) Prune cherry tree; Currently h: 6m w: 4m; request reduction to h: 4m and w: 2.5m.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
